query: select name, description, problems.creation_time as "creation_time: Timestamp", users.id as "created_by_id?", users.display_name as "created_by_name?", (select count(*) from submissions where for_problem = problems.id) as "num_submissions!: i64", (select count(*) from submissions where for_problem = problems.id and result like 'o%') as "num_correct_submissions!: i64", (select count(*) > 0 from submissions where for_problem = problems.id and submitter = ?1 and result like 'o%') as "user_solved!: bool", tests as "tests: Tests", visible as "visible: bool" from problems left join users on problems.created_by = users.id where problems.id = ?2
